page.title: 20RECREATION
page.content: MOST OF THE PEOPLE INTERVIEWED WERE OVER RETIREMENT AGE. MANY LIKED TO GARDEN. READING WAS A POPULAR HOBBY; MANY PEOPLE USED THE LOCAL LIBRARY. OTHER PEOPLES HOBBIES INCLUDED:- WALKING; SWIMMING; RIDING; YOGA; PHOTOGRAPHY; SAILING; SINGING; AND GOLF. THERE IS ONE PRIVATE GOLF CLUB IN THE AREA. THERE ARE MANY LOCAL BRANCHES OF NATIONAL ASSOCIATIONS, FOR EXAMPLE: THE NATIONAL TRUST. MANY PEOPLE LIKED WATCHING SPORT, MAINLY ON THE TELEVISION. ONE OLD LADY, A RETIRED SCHOOLTEACHER, SAID HER FAVORITE SPORTS WERE SNOOKER AND FOOTBALL, BUT SHE ENJOYED PLAYING HOCKEY AND NETBALL WHEN SHE WAS YOUNGER. MANY LADIES LIKED TO KNIT OR TO MAKE CLOTHES.
